title: Upload and Analysis Tools
subtitle: Contribute to our growing database of symbols

capture.title: Capture and Upload
capture.desc: Take photos of patterns from artifacts, architecture or textiles and upload them directly to our platform

analyze.title: Automated Analysis
analyze.desc: Our AI system examines your submissions to identify patterns, match them with our database and suggest cultural contexts

share.title: Share and Collaborate
share.desc: Once analyzed, your contributions become part of our global repository and can be studied by the community

process.title: Analysis Process
process.subtitle: See how we transform artifacts into catalogued patterns
process.example: Our system identifies recurring patterns, extracts them and matches them with our database.
